context.p: Users can forward the Server and Agent Event logs to an external Syslog server for increasing monitoring and management capabilities. TXOne StellarOne console forwards logs in the Common Event Format (CEF). Make sure your Syslog server supports the Common Event Format (CEF).

step.cmd: Click the Forward logs to syslog server (CEF only) toggle to switch on the function.
Specify the Server Address, Port, and Protocol of the Syslog server.
Click Save to complete the settings.
